pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gotchard (2023, TV show)$(br2)Used to access Gotchard's $(l:gotchard/riders/gotchard#dokkirishovel)Dokkirishovel$(/l) form$(br2)Used to access Valvarad's $(l:gotchard/riders/valvarad#gutsshovel)Gutsshovel$(/l) or $(l:gotchard/riders/valvarad_rider#orochishovel)Orochishovel$(/l) Custom
